msg.msgText:
imaserver group add "Item1=value" ... SYNTAX: imaserver group add help imaserver group add "Item1=value" ... EXAMPLE: imaserver group add "GroupID=msgGroup1" imaserver group add "GroupID=msgGroup2" "GroupMembership=msgGroup1"
Configuration items are: GroupID The group ID. GroupMembership Add the group specified by GroupID as a member of this group. Description The description for the group. NOTES: 1. "GroupID" is a required item. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks. 3. The property "Type" is not supported with group add. The group will be added with a default type of Messaging.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
